Title: Eastwatch
Sentence: So what do we do? Sue for peace? I sit on her father's throne, the father you betrayed and murdered. And in her mind she's winning. What sort of offer do you think she'd make?

Title: Winterfell
Sentence: You did, my lady. It was the honor of my life. I'll always be grateful for your faith. But when I left Winterfell, I told you we need allies or we will die. I have brought those allies home to fight alongside us. I had a choice, keep my crown or protect the North. I chose the North.

Title: Winterfell
Sentence: But we're family. The last Greyjoys left in the world. The last ones with balls anyway.

Title: Winterfell
Sentence: And our queen is grateful.

Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Sentence: Men do stupid things for women. They're easily manipulated.

Sentence: You've had a strange journey.

Title: The Iron Throne
Sentence: I know you don't want it. I know you don't care about power. But I ask you now, if we choose you will you wear the crown? Will you lead the Seven Kingdoms to the best of your abilities from this day until your last day?

Title: The Iron Throne
Sentence: You think anyone will dare tell you women aren't allowed?
